siteMetadata.name: Naaman Tan
siteMetadata.title: Naaman Tan | Software Engineer
siteMetadata.description: Computer Science undergraduate with experience in full-stack development and NLP, CV and Geometric DL. If you need an engineer who can quickly prototype concepts and scale them up, I could be the person you’re looking for.
siteMetadata.about:
Hi! My name is Naaman. I'm a fourth year student studying Computer Science and Economics at the National University of Singapore.
      I used to study engineering. But three unhappy semesters and a couple of robotics projects convinced me to take a leap of faith and study Computer Science instead, and I've not looked back since. I've spent a lot of my time in university focused on deep learning systems and its adjacent fields - computer vision, natural language processing, graph machine learning, database systems, distributed systems etc., and I think it's pretty neat.
      Outside of work, I spend my time reading books, playing badminton and watching movies.

markdownRemark.excerpt: I’m still thinking. Pros: A lot Cons: Also quite a few
markdownRemark.html:
I’m still thinking.

Pros:

  • A lot

Cons:

  • Also quite a few

frontmatter.title: Should I go to grad school?
frontmatter.description: Maybe, maybe not, but the answer right now is probably not immediately after my undergrad.
